title: PIA shows great recovery despite COVID-19 pandemic: Faisal Javed
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 11 (APP): Pakistan Tehreek Insaf (PTI) leader Senator Faisal Javed Khan on Sunday said Pakistan International Airlines (PIA) showed great recovery, despite COVID-19 pandemic.
In a tweet, he said, “total losses reduced by 33.7% in PIA and it has nearly achieved operational break-even”, adding that “it’s gross profit in 2020 Rs 2.4 billion & operational loss reduced from 6.1 billion to only 68 Crore.
Great signs as under PM ImranKhan –  institutions are being revived. Despite Corona, @Official_PIA shows great  recovery. Total losses reduced by 33.7% & it has nearly achieved operational break-even. It's Gross Profit in 2020=Rs 2.4Bn & Opr loss reduced frm 6.1 Bn to only 68 Cr pic.twitter.com/TTzTVeMmO1
— Faisal Javed Khan (@FaisalJavedKhan) April 11, 2021
